# File lib/cucumber/webrat/element_locator.rb, line 14
    def to_table
      case element.name
      when 'table'
        table_from_table
      when 'dl'
        table_from_dl
      when /ul|ol/
        table_from_list
      else
        raise "#to_table not supported for #{element.name} elements"
      end
    end
